name: Scratchiverse
description:
Click two elements to create a new element. Press C or clear to clear the two boxes and fuse again (if it doesn't clear automatically). Press M or the mute button to mute all audio. Press the hint button for an idea on what element you should work on getting next. Collect a total of 53 elements!

Last Update I added a mute audio button, but you can also mute by pressing M on your keyboard. I also fixed a bug where newer elements added cleared the merge variables AFTER the sound finished playing. Edited the description of the game.

Credit goes to the video game Doodle God for the idea and the music.

Recommend additions in the comments!
